text:
HUBL variables are not working in anchor tag

<a href="<https://www.columbusglobal.com/{{release_bu_name}}/news-detail?id={{x.id>}}" target="_blank"> <p> {{ x.leadtext }}</p> </a> This anchor tag is not working in my few pages. But it is working in some other pages.
Please help me out.
When we hit on any record/ row on the below page, it was redirecting to the detail page with special characters as shown in the image.
<https://staging.columbusglobal.com/da/news/news-global?hs_preview=YfNHKdnr-41051176439>
